subject: Re: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
Mike, quick question...I have been experimenting with a multichannel
system inspired by your spiricomp system. Rather than adding the white
noise at the computer recording stage, I have a standalone dvd player
with a looping track. I have experimented with white and pink noise
tracks, but was just curious which you have had the most success with.
I also made a brown/red noise track, and wondered if you had
experimented with that at all. 

Thanks in advance, you work has been very helpful in getting me
started down this road.

Thanks,
Andy

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)"
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> For those who care to see... I've posted a quick 4 minute video tour of 
> the EVP and ITC systems I use, with a quick explanation of their setup.
> The video is at:
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyQKmBXY1ig
> 
> Thanks...
> and have a super-natural paranormal day!
> - Mike Coletta
> http://www.ufomagazine.net
>
